document.full_text: philadelphia's lou williams may only play 23 minutes a game, but a strained hamstring that could keep williams out of the playoffs is nonetheless damaging to the sixers' playoff hopes.
document.title: sixers face trouble without williams
lines_and_colors: philadelphia's lou williams may only play 23 minutes a game, but a strained hamstring that could keep williams out of the playoffs is nonetheless damaging to the sixers' playoff hopes.
